If necessary, note the specifics of the game in different modes (AB, RB, SB).'' === Pros and cons === '''Pros:''' * turret with high fire rate * Airbrakes * Customizable armament consist of 250kg , 500kg and 1000kg bombs * High maximum dive speed for its tier * '''Cons:''' * Pretty slow speed * Poor rate of climb * Bad energy retention * Poor performance while equipped with 1,000 kg bomb * Can carry only one bomb at a time * loses a lot of speed when turning * == History == The Ju-87 R-2 Libya belonged to  St.G 2 and was used off the Libyan coast in Timimi to attack Allied ships in the Mediterranean. It was flown by Leutenant Hubert Pölz of 6./St.G 2 and participated in the sinking of HMS Auckland off Tobruk in June 1941.
